mdRecord.dcterms:title: Family Correspondence and Personal Letter Sent from Occoquan River
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Family correspondence, personal letter dated June 14, 1861, to "My Dear Wife," sent from Occoquan River, Camp Davis Ford, from C. M. Stigleman, I original piece.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
